description: Levelup Reality is Toronto’s virtual reality (VR) arcade and events venue, and we take you beyond the limits of reality into a rich immersive experience, where you can connect with others while engaging all of your senses. We have been ranked as one of the coolest indoor activities in Toronto while being one of the most fun and adventurous things to do in Downtown Toronto GTA. We also host the best corporate events, business team building games, and large group game parties for companies and offices in Toronto. Enjoy single and multiplayer adventure, shooters, action, horror, escape room, and short films experiences! We have one of the largest libraries of games!

reviews.title: good time with friends - will go again
text: super fun. Lots of games to choose from, all types of styles. Was a great experience with my friends

reviews.title: Wonderful experience
text: It was our first time playing a VR game and we had a blast! There was a variety of games to choose from and the staff were very patient in answering our questions during both the training session and actual gameplay. I definitely plan on coming back with other friends when I get the chance!

reviews.title: The best
text: The workers were extrememly helpful and they were kind enough to help me move my appointment.
They sanitized the area when we were done
They were closeby for any assistance that we needed
The games were also cool and nice

reviews.title: Definitely a must try for anyone
text: Great staff and great atmosphere.  The staff really went above and beyond to make our experience memorable.

reviews.title: Time flew by so fast!
text: We had so much fun playing multiplayer. 1 hour isn’t enough, definitely should do more than an hour!

reviews.title: Really fun to try something new!
text: Super fun! I did this with coworkers and we had a really great time. There were a lot of variety of games to try and the staff always super helpful with the technology. It felt very futuristic -- I would come back and play with other friends : - )

reviews.title: Fun time with VR game
text: It was really fun time with my friends. Need to do game with actual moving so my arm was a bit sore but it was new experience! When ever we had a struggle in the game, staffs told us how to fix the problem and give us instructions :) if I have a chance definitely I will go back there!

reviews.title: A truly wonderful experience
text: Joshua and the team were great. Had a wonderful experience. I went with my partner for the first time and the staff was very patient to explain the instructions. Joshua helped us during the VR sessions since this has a learning curve. We are looking forward to going the next time and try out more games/experience.

reviews.title: Mind blowing
text: Very amazing experience !! I recommend it to anyone absolutely fun especially for groups and couple would definitely go again

reviews.title: SUCH A FUN EXPERIENCE
text: Such a fun experience! The guide helps you through everything and you can even do multi player! The 1 hour flew by so fast I wish we had more time! Def will come back again

reviews.title: Great
text: Staff was very friendly and very helpful.I
Brought out the family for a evening of fun and games and everyone had a amazing time

reviews.title: Great VR place for groups
text: This was my first time doing a VR experience and this was an absolute blast. Setup was extremely fast and the games were very quick to load into. The staff was with us the entire time so if we had any questions, they could help us immediately. The games themselves were very fun too and included a variety of single player and multiplayer games. Highly recommend.

reviews.title: Nice people, great location
text: Friendly staff who were always there to help, a cool, futuristic & distanced layout, easy to book, easy to park next door and lots of fun games. Brilliant session!

reviews.title: An hour of fun and wonder
text: Such great fun! Loved all the vr adventures, especially climbing Mount Everest! Senna was great at training, guiding, and helping us. The place was very nice and super clean. The experience was well worth the price. Will go back for sure.

reviews.title: Great experience, great time - Arizona Sunshine & Cowbots and Aliens
text: We played two games Arizona Sunshine & Cowbots and Aliens both games were fun the cowbots was a lot more fun because it was easier to learn how to play and you are playing against your friends. The Arizona Sunshine was fun but it was a lot harder to figure out how to play reloading ammo was very difficult. None the less I would definitely go back there the staff were friendly and helpful

reviews.title: So. Much. Fun.
text: Amazing. My husband, kids and I all had a BLAST! Staff was so helpful and accommodating and fun. We all found something we could enjoy.

reviews.title: Excellent unique group experience
text: This was my first time in a VR arcade, staff was amazing, explained everything in detail. I am not new to VR so VR experience wise it wasn't different, but amazing as always. It was also a lot of fun playing with my group together. Definitely would return for special occasions, found a new fun activity to enjoy in a group.

reviews.title: Excellent
text: Amazing. For sure I would like to do it again next time in Toronto. The staff was great and had a lot of patience to teach how to use the controls.

reviews.title: Interesting & unique experience - if you have the stomach for it!
text: Great for group / corporate events - the games allow multiple players to be engaged at once and it's great to bring out that competitive spirit!

The in-game experience is pretty fun, but VR hasn't evolved to the point yet where action games don't still make you feel nauseated (it took most folks in my group a bit of time for their stomachs to settle after playing for ~ 20 minutes).
I would come back again for a special event - e.g. a birthday, another corporate event - but I don't think I'll be a frequent visitor!

reviews.title: Great team building for colleagues
text: Feeling what it would be like to fly through a city like a super hero. Even the feeling of falling was pretty wild. The team dodgeball was a lot of fun too.

reviews.title: Very nice
text: Nice and amazing and very much fun experience. Enjoyed a lot with my best friend and my girlfriend. E

reviews.title: Great experience
text: Staffs were friendly and helpful, we’ll come back for sure! We had so much fun and there are many games to choose from.

reviews.title: must try!!!!
text: Experience was great!! definitely going back with friends again. staff were great and training was provided. It does take a little bit of time getting used to movements and controls but overall very fun!

reviews.title: Good
text: It was good experience overall. Felt the duration was very less and need more time to understand how to play.

reviews.title: Fun workout
text: It was much fun! We played two games. I realized the next day, it was a good workout :)
We also plan to bring our kids for a birthday party.

reviews.title: Excellent Service and Staff
text: Very friendly and welcoming staff. Helping my friend and I enjoy our first VR experience. Will definitely recommend and go back.

reviews.title: Fabulous
text: It was really good, Patrick helped us a lot. Good variety of game and a decent clean place! I would go soon

reviews.title: Best unexpected and exciting experience
text: Unbelievable! Plan on coming back and staff was beyond helpful to make the whole experience unforgettable for everyone that came of all ages!

reviews.title: Great first time visit
text: It was my first time going to VR. I went with my 8 yr old son. Wow, we both enjoyed the time there! The staff made it super easy for us. We were explained how to use the equipment and how to put it on. Next they showed us not only the games they have but gave a quick intro of some of them, which is very helpful for the first time. During the game time staff can come and help with the issues if any. There are many games to choose from and they are fun with the full VR experience. It's totally worth the price. And great to go there with kids :)

reviews.title: Like an Indoor Adventure
text: I WAS SO SURPRISED BY HOW MANY GAMES THERE WERE TO CHOOSE FROM! The staff was really great in helping us make sure we're set up properly, that we can all hear each other, and even explaining the mini games within the game we chose. I could stay here for hours. It's a place where you can have fun by yourself or go with a group of friends. I definitely plan to go again and highly recommend it to everyone else!

reviews.title: So much fun
text: The MOST fun I've ever had! It was my first time trying VR and I'm a little on the older side, not a gamer at all, but the staff at Levelup was very helpful and they guide you throughout the whole experience if needed. Had an amazing time, played single and 2 player games. I will be back. The hour passed like it was 5 minutes.

reviews.title: Time of my life!!!!
text: It was my boyfriend’s bday and this was his idea. We had an absolutely amazing time. An hr isn’t nearly enough. We will 100% be going back on a regular basis.
3 suggestions:

*A better idea than the awkward video keepsake that’s for sale would be 2 photos for $5-$10. 1 during, and 1 after. We wish we had taken photos of the experience. We were having too much fun to even remember.

*if it’s available, you should upswell an xtra 30mins 5 mins before the guests’ time is up. Our time ended rather abruptly after a technical glitch occurred. If we had been offered more time (ESPECIALLY at a discounted rate), we would have happily accepted.
3 negatives:
* the lack of accessibility.  There were no elevators, and 3 loooooooong flights of stairs. This should be mentioned on the faq.

*the location was INCREDIBLY hard to find. Perhaps mention on your website, as well as on the emailed confirmation, that the location is in the mcveigh (???) building DIRECTLY on the corner of church and Richmond.
*the confirmation email/receipt should have the address and phone# on them. we had to search for both when we were trying to find the address.
Notes: masks were worn by all. There was hand sanitizer and wipes all over, and both the space and the bathrooms were SUPER Clean.

reviews.title: Great fun for teen gamers!
text: Brought my 13 year old and husband.  They had a blast!  They enjoyed playing co-op games.  Entertaining to watch even as a non participant.

reviews.title: Amazing first time VR experience!
text: First time experiencing VR and it was simply amazing! The staff was super helpful and knowledgeable. And that made all the difference in figuring out the games to play with my friend. Would recommend 10/10.

reviews.title: Fun new experience
text: Great variety of games including multiplayer; staff are super friendly and very helpful and the space is clean and bright. Overall very fun experience and will be returning!

reviews.title: The staff were really good and patient - I really enjoyed it
text: The staff were really nice and orient. I enjoyed myself and had fun with my family. I would recommend it to others

reviews.title: Great experience
text: This was a great experience with lots of different games to choose from. It was very realistic also.

reviews.title: Amazing fun!!
text: My grandson enjoyed the whole experience.  The staff there are amazing and very helpful.  We have been there several times and I really recommend Level Up! 👌

reviews.title: Nice
text: It was really nice 👌🏿👌🏿I enjoyed it so much ne I hope to be there next time and have time to enjoy more games

reviews.title: Fun Time
text: Staff was very helpful and friendly. First time trying this place but definitely not the last.
Fun family experience.
